title: Is Indy cheating too?
author: VD
content_html: ProFootballTalk provides a link to a recording of the weird effect on the crowd noise at last night’s Colts-Patriots game. It’s interesting to see how much quieter the crowd was after the effect disappeared, creating the obvious impression that fake crowd noise is being used to pump up the volume inside the stadium.
content_text:
ProFootballTalk provides a link to
a recording of the weird effect
on the crowd noise at last night’s Colts-Patriots game.  It’s interesting to see how much quieter the crowd was after the effect disappeared, creating the obvious impression that fake crowd noise is being used to pump up the volume inside the stadium.
